disclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer:
disclaimer.text: CommunityHub acts as a marketplace platform connecting service providers with customers. We do not employ service providers and are not responsible for the services provided. All providers are independent professionals. Prices and availability are subject to change. Terms and conditions apply.
disclaimer.paymentText: Payments are processed securely through our certified partners. Refund policies vary by service provider. Please review individual provider terms before booking.
